title: GOING FAST - Historic Mansion Renovation - 1bdrm Suite - Pets Welcome
posting_body: Incredible 1902 Lakeview East Mansion converting into 17 luxurious apartment suites - ONLY 4 REMAIN.

This one bedroom suite features in unit laundry, upgraded fixtures, upgraded fixtures and appliances, wood floors, additional storage, built in closet organizers, chef's kitchen, smart home technology, ceiling fan, iconic millwork and windows, and so much more.
This amazing building is located just steps from Lake Michigan, Shopping, Belmont Harbor, Dog Beach, Dining, Entertainment, CTA, Transit, Gyms, Wrigley Field, Halsted Street Bars, and so much more.
The property is professionally managed, well maintained, and pet friendly with no breed restrictions.
To schedule a showing contact Beacon, with The Marr Group at Fulton Grace, @ 312-373-0166
$350 move in fee - for one person
$250 move in fee/person - for more than one person
$30 pet rent per pet per month
$75 utility fee including high speed internet
12 month lease will be accepted, but the rent will increase $200 monthly.
